sn19.16:1.1: “Idhaham, avuso, gijjhakuta pabbata orohanto addasam asisakam kabandham vehasam gacchantam.
sn19.16:1.2: Tassa ure akkhini ceva honti mukhanca.
sn19.16:1.3: Tamenam gijjhapi kakapi kulalapi anupatitva anupatitva vitacchenti virajenti.
sn19.16:1.5: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmimyeva rajagahe hariko nama coraghatako ahosi …pe….
